byline.contributor: David W. Chen and Kate Taylor contributed reporting.

snippet: A federal judge ruled that a court-appointed authority would be installed to ensure that more minority candidates are hired at the New York Fire Department.
lead_paragraph: A federal judge ruled that a court-appointed authority would be installed to ensure that more minority candidates are hired at the New York Fire Department.

headline.main: Monitor Must Oversee Fire Dept. Hiring Practices, Judge Rules
headline.print_headline: Citing Racial Inequities, Judge Says Fire Dept. Hiring Must Be Monitored
headline.seo: Monitor Must Oversee N.Y. Fire Dept. Hiring, Judge Rules
